xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/406067-Dios sólo mira 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Short thriller about a photojournalist who had to watch other people's death. He is questioned on whether he made the right choice by taking the picture of a man who commits suicide in Haiti. He is then haunted further by a mysterious series of photographs sent to him, one of which shows his own death. Dios sólo mira
